function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Strong correlations between key words relating to green building and user satisfaction, life cycle, and decision-making dimensions.","Impact":"Potential for biased or limited analysis of green housing and its relation to COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Use broader and more diverse keyword selection for analysis, conduct comprehensive literature review.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, analysts, decision-makers","Owner":"Research institutions, scientific committees"},{"Description":"Distributional hypothesis confirmed, indicating strong correlation between key search words.","Impact":"May lead to oversimplified or misleading conclusions in the analysis of green building topics.","Mitigation":"Use multiple analytical techniques and validate findings with real-world data.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, data visualization software","People":"Data scientists, analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, data science teams"},{"Description":"Colored document-frequency matrix used for analysis of articles on green building.","Impact":"Relying solely on keyword frequency may overlook important research trends and developments.","Mitigation":"Incorporate qualitative analysis and thematic coding alongside the frequency matrix.","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, qualitative analysis software","People":"Researchers, analysts, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, academic researchers"}]}
